name: Rupayan Sarkar
position: Senior Software Engineer at Oracle Database In-Memory | Research Intern at Microsoft Research | IISc | IIT Kharagpur EECS '21

current_company.name: Oracle
current_company.title: Senior Software Engineer at Oracle Database In-Memory | Research Intern at Microsoft Research | IISc | IIT Kharagpur EECS '21

positions.subtitle: Oracle
positions.description: Working in the Oracle Data/Space/Transactions team in the In-Memory technologies group. I work on the core data, indexing and RCU layers of Oracle's next generation NVM-aware database engine.
positions.title: Senior Member of Technical Staff

positions.subtitle: Oracle
positions.description: Worked on the backend infrastructure of the deployment webservice in Oracle Database Appliance. Was responsible for the server communication (SSH), distributed locking and cluster coordination (ZooKeeper) modules.
positions.title: Member of Technical Staff
positions.description_html: Worked on the backend infrastructure of the deployment webservice in Oracle Database Appliance. Was responsible for the server communication (SSH), distributed locking and cluster coordination (ZooKeeper) modules. <!---->

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Worked in Microsoft Research India Speech and Natural Language Group. Worked on adversarial example generation in NLP, using RL and Graph Neural Networks. Also worked on contextual alignment and guiding of encoder-decoder models.
experience.description_html: Worked in Microsoft Research India Speech and Natural Language Group. Worked on adversarial example generation in NLP, using RL and Graph Neural Networks. Also worked on contextual alignment and guiding of encoder-decoder models. <!---->

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Worked in Oracle Database Appliance and Automatic Storage Management Team. Worked on caching algorithms for a FUSE-based filesystem backed by object storage.
experience.description_html: Worked in Oracle Database Appliance and Automatic Storage Management Team. Worked on caching algorithms for a FUSE-based filesystem backed by object storage. <!---->

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: I worked at the Centre for NanoScience and Engineering at the Indian Institute of Science, under Professor Akshay Naik. My work involved dynamical systems modelling and resonance mode characterization of Graphene and Transition Metal Dichalcogenide NEMS Resonators.
experience.description_html: I worked at the Centre for NanoScience and Engineering at the Indian Institute of Science, under Professor Akshay Naik.
